titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1941 WOODWARD 65 rue Ampère - XVII Oct 2 Eye in the Museum Oct 28 In Face of the Verdict Oct 24 Busman's Honeymoon Oct 28 Oct 11 Can Such Things Be Oct 24 11 Little Nugget Nov 10 Lucky Prisoner Yes! ever returned? Oct 24 Men Women & Boats, Crane Nov 1 28 Problem of the Green Capsule Nov 29 31 Yeats's Plays in Prose and Verse Nov 29 (sent by post with New Arabian Nights) Dec 8 As I was going down Sackville Street Sept 21 July 1942 EGC wrote had book safe
Sept 21 1942 returned also Movers and Shakers and Water-Babies
finished Received Nov 4 COUPON 37 fr
NOM ET ADRESSE DE L'EXPÉDITEUR: M.E.G. Craig 11 bis Rue de Nouilles St. Germain-en-Laye
Montant Du Mandat:
37 fr. - c.
AVIS DE PRESENTATION
1940 WOODWARD Miss 116 bis rue de Noailles St Germain en Laye. T.E. Aug 28. D.H. Lawrence by his friends Sept 27 Sept 4 - F Nov Best Crime Book (taken by Mr. Craig) Feb 10 Feb 20 Brazilian Ordeal
1941 WOODWARD Miss Daphne. Pension de Noailles 11 bis rue de Noailles Tel: St Germain-en-Laye 678
Jan 28 Letters of T E Lawrence July 2 Feb 20 Brazilian Adventure returned 20 Sad Cypress Mar. 3 20 Ten little Niggers Feb 25 25 Renaissance March 7 Lucky Prisoner X Death Coins March 7 March 7 Variety March 19 April 10 3 days Terror May 31 10 Trent interviewer May 20 20 Forbidden Journey July 2 20 England's Pleasant Land (G.C.) July 2 July 7 Death in 5 Boxes July 21 7 Case of the howling dog July 21 17 Reader is Warned Sept 6 17 Punch + Judy Murders July 21 21 Judas Window Sept. 1 24 Drop to his death Sept. 1 27 Magic Lantern Murders July 27 Sept 1 Mystery of the yellow room Oct 11 Sept 15 1 Glass Slipper Sept 15 1 Whose body Sept 3 1 Water babies Sept 3 Death on the Boat Train Sept. 15 15 Ones Company Sept. 15 15 Maltese Falcon Oct 11 15 Murder in the Squire's Pew Oct 11 " " of Roger Ackroyd Oct 11
